sentence.Network_en: His course at Sheffield University will not recommence until next year.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在谢菲尔德大学的课程要到明年才能继续。

sentence.Network_en: Work on the bridge will recommence next month.
sentence.Network_cn: 下个月将重新开始这座桥的建造工作。

sentence.Network_en: Please note that we are presently conducting a routine system maintenance. Our services will recommence shortly.
sentence.Network_cn: 请注意,我们的网站正在进行常规系统维修, 系统将在短时间内恢复正常运作!

entry.def: If you recommence something or if it recommences, it begins again after having stopped.

example.ex: He recommenced work on his novel...
His course at Sheffield University will not recommence until next year.
example.tran: 他在谢菲尔德大学的课程要到明年才能继续。

sentences.sentence: "The Taliban recommenced hostilities after a few days of quiet"
"we recommenced his reading after a short nap"

auth_sentence.content: Voter registration was to recommence Monday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Voter registration was to recommence Monday.

auth_sentence.content: Refinery restarts will depend on how quickly Libya can recommence crude production.
auth_sentence.res_content: Refinery restarts will depend on how quickly Libya can recommence crude production.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Refinery restarts will depend on how quickly Libya can recommence crude production.

auth_sentence.content: I stooped to drink on year ago, but in one party I recommence to drink again.
auth_sentence.res_content: I stooped to drink on year ago, but in one party I recommence to drink again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I stooped to drink on year ago, but in one party I recommence to drink again.
